name: Maxwell

ingredients.item: ml Brut Champagne or other sparkling wine (about 1 split bottle)

preparation:
This refreshing Champagne cocktail is perfect for a date—the recipe makes a pair of drinks.

Serves 2.

Add all ingredients except Champagne into a large shaker with ice and shake well for 10 seconds.

Double-strain into 2 flutes.

Top each with Champagne and chill the rest of the bottle in an ice bucket.

While drinking, top with more Champagne as needed.
